long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inspiration Tab provides an alternative experience to the Chrome browser's "new tab" page; adding an elegant user interface and search bar, and an inspiring quote and calming nature backgrounds

About Us page:   https://inspiriquotes.com#about
Contact Us page: https://inspiriquotes.com#contact
Privacy Policy page: https://inspiriquotes.com/privacy.html
Terms & Conditions page: https://inspiriquotes.com/terms.html

The search features within this extension will be provided by Microsoft Bing
Images taken from the Unsplash image API (https://unsplash.com)
Quotes provided by zenquotes.io (https://zenquotes.io/)
